channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 01:39 Air alert in Kyiv city. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 01:39 Air alert in Kyiv city. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_city This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 22:17 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Take cover!
